name: Treasure Tile (GolemHouse)
description:
Treasure Tile is a fantasy ARPG about fighting monsters and earning loot. Defeat all the monsters and get all the loot!

Move/attack with [WASD]
Inventory - [I]
Character Screen - [C]
This is an early prototype - all feedback is welcome and appreciated.

If you want to know when our next big update will hit, you can subscribe to our newsletter. And if you want to ask some questions or become an actual participant in these early stages of the development, feel free to join our Discord channel, where you can also find some concept art, more information or even just chat with the developers themselves :)
